answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some grant policy and procedure manuals from various jurisdictions that should be useful.
The District of Columbia Office on Ageing, Grants Policy Manual provides an overview of the process from proposal submission to final close out. 
http://dcoa.dc.gov/DC/DCOA/Publication%20Files/DCOA%20Publications/Grants%20Policy%20Manual_dcoa.pdf
The Clark County, Washington’s Community Development Block Grant Procedures Manual provides information on program functions, procurement, labor standards, property acquisition and so on. 
http://www.co.clark.wa.us/cdbg/documents/CDBG%20manual.pdf 
The Chester County, PA’s Trail Construction Grant from the Preservation Partnership Program provides guidelines, procedures, project evaluation criteria and grant contract. 
http://dsf.chesco.org/openspace/lib/openspace/manuals/PPPtrailmanual.pdf
The Yakima County, Washington’s Grants Management: Policies and Procedures includes accounting for revenue and expenditures, cost allocation, cost pooling, audits, monitoring and budgeting.
http://www.yakimacounty.us/grantsmgmt/Policies.pdf 
Board of Education of Wicomico County, MD Grant Procedures manual includes a detailed grant application/ submission/ reporting process. 
http://www.wcboe.org/resources/documents/GrantProceduresManual.pdf 
Washington’s Calallam County Grant Management Policy and Procedure Administrative Manual. 
http://www.clallam.net/Board/assets/applets/Grants.pdf
I hope this is helpful,
Pooja 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org
